cases.title: Radio player built in React using the Sveriges Radio API
cases.description: Searchable radio hub using channels from the Sveriges Radio API. The search function is case-insensitive and the page itself is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.

cases.title: Chrome weather extension using the Open Weather API
cases.description: Weather app for the cities of Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmoe using information from the Open Weather API. The background changes colour depending on the current temperature. Optimized for desktop.

cases.title: Registration form built in HTML5 and CSS3
cases.description: Built as an exercise in re-creating the World of Warcraft sign-up form as closely as possible using only HTML and CSS3. The page is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.

cases.title: Product page built in React using a custom API
cases.description: Product page built in React using a custom JSON file of products. The page is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.

cases.title: Newspaper layout using HTML5 and CSS3
cases.description: Newspaper layout for a fictional cat news site. The page is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.

cases.title: Animated accordion using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript
cases.description: Simple FAQ accordion using JavaScript to create smooth opening och closing animations.

cases.title: Yearbook site using HTML5 and CSS3
cases.description: Yearbook site with a Holy Grail layout built using Flexbox. The page is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.

cases.title: Clock built in React
cases.description: Simple real-time clock built in React, featuring start and stop buttons. The background colour changes depending on the time of day.

cases.title: VAT Calculator built in React
cases.description: VAT calculator built using React, with options to calculate VAT using either one of three fixed rates or a custom option. The page is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.

cases.title: To-do app wit local storage built in React
cases.description: To-do app built in React. Tasks are saved in the browser using local storage and the user can create new tasks, check and uncheck existing ones and remove them from the list permanently. The page is fully responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.
